description: MainActivity class for an Android note-taking app; manages displaying, searching, filtering, and navigating notes including editing and favoriting.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Activities serving as the main screen, displaying a list of notes with search and filter capabilities, and handling navigation and note interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds UI components, sets up listeners, and loads notes.

methods.name: applyFilters
methods.description: Filters notes based on search query and selected filter, then updates display.

methods.name: onNoteClick
methods.description: Handles note click event; opens note for editing.

methods.name: onFavoriteToggle
methods.description: Toggles favorite status of a note and updates repository.
